attributes.title: Full Stack Developer
attributes.description:
## Who is Full Stack Specialist? 
Like all professions related to the IT field, this type of development is prevalent in the CIS market, Europe, and the United States. That is why we are looking for a person who wants to learn and develop in this niche.

A full-stack developer is a universal programmer, and he can create a functional product without a basis, just from scratch. To work in our team, he must have basic knowledge in development, know English at the B1 + level, and desire to improve.## Responsibilities
* Bug fixes;
* Version control, database, continuous integration;
* Development of projects from scratch, as well as refinement of existing ones;
* Interaction with designers and other developers;
* Cross-browser and adaptive HTML5 / CSS3 layout;
* Work with the user interface to provide visualization and animation of pages.
## What do we need you to know?
The RemotEmployees team needs a specialist who, in addition to knowledge of HTML, JavaScript, PHP, and API, has experience with CMS, for example, WordPress, Joomla, Shopify, and others. You must also be able to work with the Git version control system (and have a profile on GitHub). All other skills will be a huge plus. The Full-Stack vacancy at RemotEmployees is not only an excellent opportunity to work where you want and have a great experience, develop existing skills, improve language skills, and just work in a great and young team.## Сonditions of employment
You can choose a convenient work schedule: day shifts from 9 am to 6 pm, evening from 3 pm to midnight. 
In addition, you need a good computer and the Internet to always be in touch with us.## Interested in a vacancy?
Want to try yourself in what you like? Stop hesitating and wasting your time! Send your [video resume](/videointerview) in English as soon as possible, and we will contact you. Become part of our team!
## The task of the Full-Stack web developer
* Participate in site design
* Landing Page Layout
* Work with existing code
* Monitor server status
* Work with system modules

attributes.title: QA Engineer
attributes.description:
## What is a QA Engineer UX?
A QA Engineer UX is a specialist who tests the quality of software and to which extent it meets the predetermined requirements and expected results.
QA specialists develop and realize tactics to improve quality at each level of production:
* Standards preparation and establishment
* Quality analysis;
* Tools choice
* Bugs prevention and constant process improvement
## Responsibilities of QA Engineer UX 
Testing involves all the development cycle and includes:
* Planning;
* Projecting;
* Creation and performance of test-cases and test-plans.
* Quality assurance of any product of any type
And QA engineers play the main role in it; They have a single aim which is to test and assure standards of product.## Join us
We are looking for a QA engineer for websites and mobile applications, who can test and constitute a bug report, and working in a team he / she can improve our products and resources of our clients.
Each team member knows his / her tasks and understands the ultimate aim of the project, that is why it is vital for a QA engineer to communicate with each team member.
If you are looking for a QA engineer UX job, but you are inexperienced, we will offer you a job with our company, where you can gain practice in international projects. 
Are you interested?
Then record [video resume](/videointerview) about yourself and your skills and send it to us.
We consider inexperienced candidates, so don’t miss your chance to start working in the IT company. It is a good opportunity to develop your career in the IT industry.
## Requirements for QA Engineer UX
* Ability to write bug reports properly
* Draw up test plans and test cases
* English level not less than B2
* Good communicative skills
